text: Park Avenue in mid-December. On the lampposts, Xmas light sparkle over streets slick with slush and rain. Limousine line up for a public function.

Under black umbrellas, wealthy men and women exit the lim and enter a stately ten-story building. On the facade, a sign reads: TONIGHT - TREASURES OF PRE-CHRISTIAN EUROPE. A SHADOWY FIGURE lurks in an alley near the corner. His features are hidden by a broad-brimmed hat. He watches as The guests present gleaming, golden invitations to the security people at the door.

(in Elvish, subtitled) I'll go up first. You'll enter from below- He addresses WINK, an eight-foot tall TROLL with grey ski and a huge scar over his left, empty, eye socket. His rig hand is missing and he sports a heavy IRON MACE instead. plume of breath escapes from his brutish mouth.
And remember Wink- (BEAT)
Don't be shy. He extends his arms and with a swoop, he climbs the wall, up, up, like a bat. Five floors up... 3
CAMERA lingers on the bloated features of a stone FERTILI GODDESS.

Pre-Celtic votive sculpture is in granite and has been dated circa 700 B.C. Like the guests, the AUCTIONEER is dressed in formal wear TV MONITORS display the image of the statue so the bidder can have a closer look.
We'll open the bidding at two hundred thousand dollars. A DISTINGUISHED BUYER raises his hand-
Two hundred and seventy-five, and... we have three hundred, thank you Mr. Van Hausen - Three hundred thousand once- A FEMALE BIDDER raise her hand-
And Three hundred and fifty thousand, thank you Mrs. Bernstein- As the auction carries on, a STEWARD leaves the room and heads down -

-a darkened corridor where other STEWARDS wheel auction l to and from the sales room. The STEWARD notices an open window at the end of the corridor. He leans out and looks down. Ten stories below snow-covered alley. Suddenly, he sees the SHADOWY FIGURE above the window fra clinging to the smooth granite wall!!
What the h- Quick as lightning, the SHADOWY FIGURE covers the steward mouth. When he withdraws his hand, the steward's mouth ha
The Shadowy Figure grabs the hapless man by the lapels, hauling him outside and dangling him over the void. Far below: a spiked wrought-iron fence.
A silent human- almost as good as a dead one... (BEAT)
Almost. He releases the STEWARD, who falls-
-down- TKKCT!!! Flailing in utter silence. All the way. Onto the fence. The Figure slips through the window and moves into the- 5
And now, for our next item. Lot #777. Two STEWARDS wheel in an oaken box and open it. Nestled i maroon velvet is an eight-inch, ornately decorated arc of gold.

A once-in-lifetime opportunity. For the first time in auction. A piece of the Royal Crown of Bethmoora... A precious artifact dating from the Atrebatean period. Exquisite workmanship in 24 carat gold. The lights flicker briefly, provoking MURMURS from the audience.

Please- please- ladies and gentlemen... may I have your attention. As I was saying, observe the fanciful creatures adorning the outer surface, figures from a lost mythology... The lights go out completely. From the sudden darkness, t Shadowy Figure speaks up.
Lost- ? Not at all. Forgotten by you perhaps, but very much alive.
A few emergency lights come on, revealing The Shadowy Figure, who walks down the aisle to confront the auctione
Sir, would you please identify yourself? I see no badge or-
Shall we just say that I am the rightful owner of this piece? He seizes the artifact. The auctioneer grabs a phone and hits a button.
(to a Steward) Security- Call Security- This is an outrage- An- The SHADOWY FIGURE reaches into his pockets and throws a handful of seeds at the Auctioneer's feet.

-Outrage of- KRRRRR-K the seeds sprout into massive, thick branches an roots and instantly engulfing the Auctioneer amidst coils wooden branches, crushing him. They grow and grow until t crack the ceiling!! Soon the Auctioneer disappears, and in its place stands a compact, twisted tree. Tiny creatures emerge from its branches and crawl around the trunk. CRASH!!!!! Four SECURITY GUARDS come flying through the s doors and land in the aisles with a THUD!!! The spectator scream. WINK walks in. He carries two large IRON BOXES on his bac On the sides of the boxes A ROYAL SEAL, embossed in the metal. People cower in the corners, SCREAMING in terror and disbelief. WINK shrugs the iron boxes to the floor with a CLANG!!!! Inside them, little clawed THINGS are scrabbling - mewlin fast and hungry!! At the Shadowy Figure's signal, the troll opens the cages and the people's SCREAMS redouble.
May this remind you all why you once feared the dark... A multitude of eyes glint in the darkness, rows and rows tiny teeth shine greedily. They lunge at CAMERA.
Guards with German Shepherds patrol the fence line. Searchlights sweep the surrounding woods. Super: BUREAU FOR PARANORMAL RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT TRENTON, N.J. 10.08 P.M.

A Christmas tree glows next to the fireplace; Mozart is playing on the aquarium's underwater speakers. Floating i warm water on a cloud of bubbles is ABE SAPIEN, lost in t music. A blurry figure approaches and raps a ring finger against the tank: It's TOM MANNING, chief FBI liaison to the BPRD Looking dyspeptic, he presses a folder against the glass: TOP SECRET.
Hey, Fishstick- We gotta talk.
As they walk down the hall, manning shows Abe.

Look at that- Each photo costs a fortune to suppress. And then, naturally, they pop up on the net. CAMERA moves in on Abe's breathing apparatus. It's sleek, more modern, fitting snugly to his gills and neck. His goggles are new, too. He examines a photo of Hellboy bounding down a city stree brandishing his mighty, high-caliber Samaritan. He's look straight at the camera lens.
Oh, Lord- He's smiling in this one.
I know- It's not just the money. It's the provocation. This is asking for trouble. His ego- Manning leans close to a voice-recognition security mike.
"Man-ning..." He enunciates each syllable perfectly, then turns to Abe.
-is out of control. And I think it's all deliberate on his part. (BEAT)
He hates me. Layers of steel doors trundle open in sequence.
No, he doesn't. He's just- enthusiastic. As they approach HB's room...
How are things between him and Liz?
Oh, you know. The usual. Since they moved in together- Good days and bad. On cue, the concrete wall explodes!'.! A massive BALL OF swings the final steel door open, almost tearing it off i hinges.
Then again, there are the really bad days- Manning and Abe cower behind a pillar. Once the explosion dies away- Hellboy's revealed, lying on the floor, his ba smoking and in flames.
Oh, hi Blue- Manning- He puts out a small flame on his forearm and steps into t room.
(yelling at Liz) Well- I'm not afraid of you! You hear?? Abe and Manning peek inside-
HB stumbles around the rubble, wreathed in smoke. He hold bunch of blackened LPs and 8-track cassettes.
(yelling at Liz) Look- I have one rule! One- "Don't touch my stuff -" Liz appears, shimmering in a halo of blue flame. HB's pulls a few LP albums out of the garbage bin.
You have the same album on CD, LP and an 8 track- An 8 track!!!
You can't listen to Al Green on a CD!! You just can't!! Oh, and 8 track was the way to go- one day mankind will realize its mistake.
What about me? I need some space! Not much, but just enough to find- to find- my- toothbrush. She flares up, losing control...

Is that what this is about?? Your toothbrush's right there, behind you- (Liz turns) There- there- with the cat food!! Wrinkling her nose in disgust, Liz plucks a toothbrush fr a heap of spilled cat kibble.
Damn it, Red- there's no room for me here. You can't just act like- Suddenly, the alarm SOUNDS. Hellboy is elated.
Oh, heavenly bells are ringing! 10

Surrounded by racks of weapons, Abe, Hellboy and Liz suit up. Tight-lipped and grumpy, Liz dons black army pants and a leather jacket. She jams an automatic handgun into her utility belt. They move into a vast garage, big as a stadium. It houses fleet of planes, cars, boats, helicopters and tanks. They load weapons and ammo on board their usual transport/mobile quarters - a GARBAGE TRUCK. The perfect gentleman, Hellboy holds the door open for Li The truck interior has been refurbished with more high-te equipment. As the engine starts and the headlights blaze...
The cops have surrounded the building and helicopters hov overhead. 12
The BPRD garbage truck pulls to stop. 13
Completely refurbished, with a BANK OF MONITORS and a lar digital WORLD MAP, tracking each Paranormal.
Oh, Jeez- did you see the crowds? He offers HB a couple of cigars and lights one for him.
This is midtown Manhattan... Will you promise to be careful? You'll use discretion?
Piece of cake. In and out... no one will see me. You have my word- A sarcastic guffaw from Liz.
(GLARING)
I can be discreet if I want to be- They exit the truck and enter the building. Manning sighs
A BPRD agent (AGENT MUDD), Abe and Liz move into the big, dark sales room, past a jumble of overturned chairs. They use plasma-screen night-vision scanners to survey the devastation.
No one here. No survivors. No bodies.
Two agents lead the way down the adjacent hallway. Hellbo follows, a few feet behind. HB trains his flashlight on a fallen display case. Broken glass glitters.
Same story here, babe-
(on the intercom) Don't call me babe-
I said "Abe"- I'm sorry- wrong channel- Hellboy falls back to talk privately on the intercom.
Liz- UM-?
(on the intercom) Yes?
(WHISPERS)
When we get home... I'm gonna clean the place up; okay? Even the bathroom.
That's not the problem and you know it.
(WHISPERS)
What? You want to get rid of the cats? You can't mean that-
No. That's not the problem either-
(WHISPERS)
Then, what--?
Not now, for God's sake!

Abe, Liz and Agent Mudd fan out, moving cautiously toward the auctioneer's overturned podium. Abe discovers an empty cage... and on the iron door, the embossed ROYAL SEAL. Abe hears a high-pitched chitter- chatter and looks around: Nothing.
Red- I'm afraid I do detect some activity- As the agent and Liz inspect the other iron cages, he extends his webbed fingers.
What kind of creature?
There's more than one-? He hears a scratching noise.
(on the intercom) More- Many more-
How many- ten-?
No. Maybe a hundred- or two-
(HUFFS)
As HB nears a wall, it bulges and splits open!! The ceili cracks, too. He hurriedly loads a pair of lever-action SHOTGUN.
They're all around us- Sounds of MOVEMENT from burrowing, unseen creatures-
What are they???
Uh- If I'm right, we should leave now and ask for backup.
Manning is holding forth in a sidewalk press conference.
The situation is completely under control. Earlier tonight, customs agents discovered a few illegally imported items. This caused a minor confrontation. The reporters go wild with questions.
Federal agents have now taken over the premises. We ask that you all step back- Manning basks in the flashbulb glow and acknowledges a pretty young REPORTER.
(GRINS)
Yes, Debra-?
Plaster spills from widening cracks in the wall. Hellboy shoots, blowing open a massive hole. He peeks inside- Small bodies burrow away like moles.
What are they-? Abe?
Abe finds a human femur, wet and gnawed.
Ah, I knew it. (BEAT )
They're vicious and cruel and- The floor ripples with activity.
Have you noticed the floor??
(looking around) Uh- thick rug, deep pile, light brown-
Red- there is no rug- Hellboy lifts his foot, realizing he's been walking on an inch-thick layer of- ahem- poo.
Aw, crap-
Precisely... (BEAT)
These things have a very active metabolism. They, um- excrete as soon as they eat and then need to eat some more. There are no corpses 'cause there are no
Spit it out, brother blue. What are they?
Alright, but-
Damn it Abe, just tell us!
Okay, then- They're- um- tooth fairies.
Abe, c'mon- cut the crap. She checks her boots, sticky with poo-
Third century, the Teutoburg forest. Famished. They feed on calcium- (BEAT)

And they do go for the teeth first. How do you think they got that name "Tooth Fairies"?? Liz senses movement in the darkness. She holds out her ha and starts a small fire on her palm. She pans it like a torch, firelight sweeping the darkness
Agent MARBLE comes upon a lonely little creature peeping from a crack in the wall. It's about 9 inches high, with olive skin and almond-shaped eyes gleaming in the half- light. It whimpers softly.
Hey, this guy is cute -i. He reaches out to touch it.
Are you scared, buddy? Across the room Hellboy sees the Agent nearing the Fairy.

No, don't- The thing SNARLS, leaps and sinks its tiny teeth into MARBLE's finger. Then it dives under MARBLE's shirt and g to work. MARBLE gasps and drops his gun. Dozens of creatures emerg from the crack on the wall and crawl into Marble's clothi Gasping, he tears open his shirt as claws and teeth dig in.. ribs crack... blood spurts. The agent falls.

Liz lights up both hands, illuminating a surging tidal wa of hungry critters that engulfs the room, gnawing at the wallpaper, the furniture! The things sweep over Agent Mudd, ripping into him like wriggling piranhas.
(backing away) Oh, my-

Hellboy protects the other agent, but he feels the things swarming over him, reaching for his lips and ears... Bellowing in disgust, he fires his shotguns, splattering dozens of creatures onto the walls. Every blast, however, reveals a buzzing, hungry mass pour from the walls. HB claws at dozens more, which cling to h like baby monkeys.
The room is awash with hissing creatures, crawling over t iron cages. For an awful moment, no sign of Liz or Abe.
(sudden panic)
In reply, he hears a faint scream. He bats at the things with the SHOTGUN, wading further into the room.

Liz!! Where are you - ?! He sees a horde of little beasts gnawing at the metal bar of a cage... .Liz cowering inside. Hellboy just has time to look deep into her eyes. A quick moment of silent communion.
Do it, Liz, do it!!! And Liz obeys. Closing her eyes she-
(WHISPERS)
The fire's not my enemy. It is part of me- -gets covered by a gentle film of blue flame.
He takes refuge as-
It is mine- -the gentle flame blooms into a cloud of fire. Liz goes supernova. BAMMM!!!
A ball of fire erupts from an upstairs balcony. The crowd and reporters look up, amazed.
(MUTTERING)
Evidently we have a- gas pocket- somewhere in- The reporters stampede towards the explosion, leaving Manning alone and fuming.
Hey guys, hey guys, come back!!

28 az, ,a 2 8 INT. SALES ROOM - NIGHT Hellboy stomps down hard, popping some creatures, bashing others with the butt of his shotgun. As flames leap up, t things regroup and renew their attack. Liz and Abe run for the stairs.
Red, Red, this way- Hellboy kicks the critters away, shooting again and again
No- I'll deal with them- NOW. He dumps his backpack and pulls out a belt full of VULCAN grenades. Holds it high.

Vulcan 66, boys! Come and get 'em- Liz and Abe take cover on the stairs. They see Hellboy luring the tooth fairies toward the windows overlooking t street. 10 As the creatures climb onto him, he pulls the pins on all grenades. Soon he's a mass of swarming, gnarly fairies an
(YELLING)
No, Red- Not there! Move away from the- K-B00000MMMMMM`IN!!!!!!!!! A massive explosion-

Like a cannonball, HB flies out the upper floor window. A ball of flame, he arcs downward, covered in fighting, writhing fairies. Below, the onlookers scatter as the massive Red Giant lan in their midst, cracking the pavement. 30
Liz and Abe go to the window and look down. A TV CAMERA L ZOOMS IN ON THEM BOTH.
(into her radio) HB?? HB?? Are you alright??

The crowd is screaming. Half a dozen smoldering fairies climb out of the smoking crater and snarl at the crowd. People shrink back in horror. One of the hungry critters jumps at a woman but- BLAM!! Hellboy shoots it in mid-air, then calmly and efficiently shoots its fellows. Finally, he plucks one last creature off his coat. He hol it up by the tail, like a rodent. Manning hurries forward, witness to his worst nightmare. sea of camera flashes explodes on a grinning Hellboy.
(looks at Manning) Gee whiz, Manning- (SHRUGS)
I guess we're out now.
Behind the CREDITS are caballistic engravings suggesting power, size and weapons of a mystic, mechanical GOLDEN AR
Demolition has begun on abandoned factories and rail shed around an old ROUNDHOUSE. A sign reads: COMING NEXT SUMME THREE POINTS SHOPPING MALL. CAMERA BOOMS DOWN to a guard shack.
Guard 1 watches TV. HB is on the screen, surrounded by pr and TV.
Check it out. That guy's make-up is so fake. I mean, come on, solid red- Guard 2 is cleaning his gun.
And what's with his forehead? Is that goggles? He looks out the window and sees the THE SHADOWY FIGURE standing by the gates.
Hey, we got us a wino. He grabs his nightstick and steps outside. 35
Waving his nightstick, Guard 2 approaches the intruder. Their elongated shadows loom up above them on a brick wal

Hey- buddy- get the- The THE SHADOWY FIGURE whirls and drops his coat. He unsheathes a long, thin sword, slicing the air around the guard. The guard's shadow in the background is cut into three pa and collapses. 36

Guard 1 tunes in a game show. Looks outside- -no sign of his buddy. Behind him, at the window, WINK appears. Its MASSIVE ARM punches through the wall and hau off the GUARD and then slams his massive IRON MACE down!!
THE SHADOWY FIGURE wipes off his sword over the crumpled remains of Guard 2. Screams and bone crunching can be hea WINK emerges from behind the shack.
Effortlessly, the SHADOWY FIGURE vaults the chainlink fen and walks into the roundhouse. WINK smashes the fence and follows him through.

A few pigeons flutter through a forest of steel pillars. Radiant fingers of moonlight shine on the old train track THE SHADOWY FIGURE and WINK stop as a dozen ROYAL GUARDS helmets and light armor march out from a tunnel. After a pause, a CHAMBERLAIN joins them. He bows low in a show of respect for the Shadowy Figure.
Prince Nuada- He awaits you- Please, follow me, Sire.
The Chamberlain leads the way down a tunnel lined with mo guards. The armed men surround the Prince as they stop at intersection. The Prince prepares to unsheathe his sword- WINK growls.
I beg you, your majesty. Before entering the chamber you surrender your sword.
I will not.

Then, I regret to say, you may not see your father. It is the protocol, sire. For peasant and prince alike. Please- for the last time- surrender your sword. A tense beat and then the Prince relents. The guards accept his weapon, carefully pat him down-
Mr. Wink however- cannot dispose of his weapon. He will wait here- WINK snorts as the Prince is finally escorted through a huge, rusting iron door.

An abandoned machine shop functions as a council chamber. High-ranking heads of outlandish MAGICK FAMILIES are ther goblins, trolls, dwarves and elves. At the center sits KING BALOR The One-armed King of Elfla and, behind him, the willowy, beautiful PRINCESS NUALA, t Prince's sister. Both on the King's chest and her own, a large golden piec dangles from a chain. Nuala's resemblance to the Prince is uncanny, down to the fine scars marring their perfect faces. They're YING and YANG, almost the same being. The Prince eyes the doors closing behind him. The armed guards watch his every move. He bows his head and kneels.
Father. (eyes the Princess)
The KING gestures for him to rise.
Why have you done this?? His voice trembles with anger.
Why? ! The Prince looks at him, defiant.
I have returned from exile to set us free. All of us, Father- And to reclaim what has been taken from our people. The land and the freedom that is rightfully ours.
No- You have broken a truce that has lasted for centuries.
A shameful truce, worth nothing. How can you abide it? How- ? They have no respect for themselves, their Gods or the earth- (BEAT)
And they scorn us- every time they raise a dead, cold building, destroy a forest, or take more land- The PRINCESS then steps forward.
What they do is in their nature. We must honor our side of the agreement-
Honor-? (BEAT)
Look at this place. Is this where you hold court?? (BEAT )
Is this how we are to live?? Amidst their filth, in their rubble??? Picking at scraps from their table??? Where is the honor in that??
And what would your solution be-? War? Why? (PAUSE)
It may just be that our days are ended...
It may be- but we will not go quiet. We will not fade like this. Better to burn than fade away... And for this... Prince Nuada looks around, locking eyes with the heads of the clans.

.we'll need the help of the Good... the Bad... and the Worst- He brings out the gold artifact from the auction. Holds i high. The crowds GASPS. The King instinctively covers the companion piece hanging from his chest as a medallion.
No- you cannot be that mad-
Yes. I am.
This is the path you wish to take? Knowing the cost?
Yes, Father- it is. The King takes the Princess' hand and mournfully lowers h head.
Then, I am sorry my son- you leave me no choice. (looks at his guards) Death. His two PRAETORIAN GUARDS unsheathe their swords.
(GRIM)

I agree. Death it is- And the guards turn toward the king and stab him. The Princess screams. The Prince looks away as the old monarc tumbles from his throne, dead. The heads of the clans try flee, but are kept at bay by the other guards.

Hear me all!!! There are some amongst you that have already seen the light- (he nears the guards) Seen the future... The PRAETORIAN GUARDS cover his back as he leans forward his Father"s corpse and snatches the medallion.

As for you- You may join us in our quest or die now- His gaze is fierce, inspired. He joins the pieces togethe they fuse and interconnect through the magical equivalent NANOTECHNOLOGY. Minute gears and hooks join the pieces seamlessly into an almost complete CROWN. The Prince rais
All of those in favor, make it known.
All of the family heads sheepishly bow their heads, then kneel.
Good- I see the council is as brave as it's always been... (BEAT)
And now, my sister- The Prince looks around and sees that his sister is gone. He pushes through the mob, pulling his guards to the door
Find her- Find her- His minions surge into the tunnels.

Clutching the medallion on her chest , the Princess runs down a tunnel. A CROWD gathers behind her, chasing her as she zig-zags from tunnel to tunnel. With perfect calm, she ducks into a niche, then slides do a chute. She lands in a stone chamber lined with bookshelves.

The Princess rushes to a small cabinet. She grabs an ancient, leather-bound tome. She turns to leave, but a horde of TROLLS rushes and quic surrounds her. One of the beasts swings a heavy, rusty sword. It opens a gash in the princess' left arm-
The Prince, rushing through the tunnel with the PRAETORIA GUARDS, suddenly doubles over, cursing. Blood pours from wound in his left arm.
No- no- you fools-
As another troll lifts his sword high-

(calling out) Yrdrig!! YRDRIG, a hellhound the size of a tank, jumps out from an alcove. He has multiple heads, all of them ferocious. In seconds, he's upon the TROLLS. Each of his many mouths tears into green flesh, lifting a shaking the helpless monsters like rag dolls. The Princess slips through a secret door.
The Prince and his guards rush through the tunnels, as tr screams echo off the walls. When they finally-
-reach the Princess' chamber, it's too late. Dead and dying TROLLS lie in a heap on the floor. The Prince finds no sign of his sister. He clutches his bleeding arm.

Liz sprawls on a sofa, watching the 20-odd TV monitors in Hellboy's room. All the news channels feature footage of Heliboy's "outing" the night before. HB is grinning at the camera. Now he's signing an autogra
Yes- yes- I'd say I am that strong- I've fought many creatures over the years but none as strong as me- He winks at camera. Liz rolls her eyes.
Hellboy plunks himself down next to her, popping a can of beer.
I think I did good. And I looked good, don't you think, Liz? Abe stands behind them, juggling a dozen remote controls.
Look- there's Manning... He raises the volume as Manning is shown, surrounded by microphones.
Evidently we have a- gas pocket- somewhere in-
A gas pocket??!! Ha-! I love it. The door opens. Manning is there, holding a plastic box overflowing with mail.
Disgusted, Manning turns off the TV's.
Aw- this is a disaster! A disaster- you hear?? Worse than Cheney with a shotgun. Only Liz- (BEAT)
Only Liz handled herself with any dignity.
(glancing at HB) No one asked me anything. Manning pulls a fistful of mail out and tosses it on a table.
Don't bother starting a fan club. It's trending five to one against us.
Against?
(glances at some letters) Polls- protests- hate mail- Liz grabs a few letters and scans them.
(READING)
"Unwelcome species... mongrelizing... lower orders... ungodly freaks..." She glares at Hellboy.
Ungodly freaks-? Us?
You really did it this time- I'm under review. (to Hellboy) But so are you- As of today, there's a new team leader.
New - ? What?
Yes- You heard me. A new team leader. We're to meet him at the conference room at 0900- (looks at his watch) Now.

The SECURITY POUND is row after row of stacked cages, eac one imprisoning a different CREATURE. BPRD AGENTS patrol pens, feeding the occupants, cleaning the pans- HB looks at Manning, who is edgy and nervous.
What's the matter, Manning?? Don't you trust me anymore?
Oh- I never did- But after last night, Washington wants a new public face for the BPRD-
What about me? What's wrong with my face???
Or mine??? The press loves me!! But now you've ruined it all-
But, who-? Who is this guy?
How would I know? Evidently, he's quite the big shot- (he reads a file) His name is Johann Kraus-
Akkk- Kraus??? He's German-
(OVERLAPPING)
-a physical medium, head of the European branch of the BPRD-
(OVERLAPPING)
You know I have a problem with Germans-
(OVERLAPPING)
-a Doctor in Philosophy and Occult Practice from the University of Munich and a very eloquent speaker-
(OVERLAPPING)
-Germans make me nervous-

I guess they need a nice open face- A face people can trust. Finally, next to steel cage, they meet- JOHANN KRAUS: about 6' tall, dressed in a canvas containm suit full of tubes and taps. His hands are encased in thi latex gloves with exit valves at the fingertips and his head...
. Oh, my God-
.is a translucent glass bubble, full of gas! He is studying a drawing of the royal seal we saw on the Fairy Cages. Johann approaches Liz. He takes her hand and bows.
Johann Kraus, at your service. His unearthly voice is velvety and warm. Almost soothing. Liz smiles. Hellboy glowers as Kraus' fishbowl head turns toward them.
(whispers to manning) That's an open face for you...
Johann pulls out one of the dead, singed Fairies. Hellboy and the others gather around him.
Poor things, bought and sold on the black market. Smuggled in tight, cramped cages. Let's see what they can remember-
Memory gets pretty sketchy after you die- (nudges Abe) -but maybe I can be of help- Nudges Abe and starts fishing for an amulet.
Oh, no, no- No amulets are required. He adjusts the valves at the tips of his fingers and approaches the lock.
What are you doing?
I can inhabit inanimate things: organic,
Exactly. A PROTOPLASMIC emanation seeps out from his fingertips, slightly deflating his body. The tendrils enter the- -"Dead" Fairy.
I can briefly take control of entities, both mechanical and organic and reactivate their neural system- The "dead" Fairy snarls and bares its teeth at Hellboy. T more do the same from another pen.
(points at Hellboy) You scare him- The fairy blabbers furiously while glaring at HB.
(leering at it) Whaddayawant??? You chewed off the tip of my tail- Yes, you-
Rough translation: He says you are rude, brutish and not too bright-
Touche. More high-pitched jabbering... Johann replaces the little fairy in the holding pen.
Enough. it seems our little friend here remembers a noise. A very peculiar noise in the last place where his cage was traded: market sounds- (BEAT)
Troll language-
The troll market- ?
Exactly, Miss Sherman. The Fairy starts babbling uncontrollably and grows pale a weak.
Jeez- your buddy there doesn't look too good.
I'm losing my grip on its limbic system- He feels nauseous. I'm afraid he's about to die-
Wow- You have that effect on me too. The Fairy's cheekbones hollow and it finally collapses. Ectoplasm escapes its body and regroups at Johan's fingertips.
How can we find the Troll market??? Its location has been a source of speculation for centuries
Yes, well- Trolls dwell under bridges- And Vladimir Vanya 18th century occultist- places it under Washington Bridge
We've looked there before-- Staked it out for weeks-
Yes, but this time I have asked for a very special piece of equipment- He moves in to a large crate marked "Lot 336"
"336" The schufftein glasses??
(smiles knowingly) On loan from the Smithsonian. Plus we have this clue- He produces the sketch of the ROYAL SEAL.
In my mind we have enough to go by- Any questions?? Abe is about to ask something when, abruptly, Hellboy rai his hand-
Yes- what is it?
If you're really German- how come you don't have a funny accent?
(SIGHS)
Get ready. We are on the move. 49
Hellboy is suiting up. Liz and Abe do the same.

What a moron!! "We are on the move" He thinks he's so hot!! We've been looking for that place for years and we've never found it- (looks at Abe) You said so- Abe pulls out TWO headsets of COMPOSITE GOGGLES, made of copper and glass, full of buzzing and whirring pieces. He tries it on.
Get used to it. He might be here for good-
For good?!
He has a nice voice.
Yes, very commanding, very soothing.
I think he's a jerk.
I like him.
Well, then you're a jerk, too. "The brains of the operation-" give me a break!
They head towards the garbage truck. Manning, Abe and are waiting there.
I think you feel threatened... Hellboy stays behind- thinking- thinking real hard.
The Garbage truck and a few other BPRD vehicles crossthe Washington Bridge on the way to CHINATOWN.
Hellboy rides in silence- still thinking hard- then.
Ha! Me? Threatened?? Glaring, at Liz:
By whom? By him??
Not just him- this whole thing you did. The TV- the reporters-
I did that?
Yes, Red- absolutely. 'Cause you did it without thinking- You just wanted to be in the public's eye- well- you're there- but so are we.
Hey- We got some hate mail. (SHRUGS)
We'll deal with it. Together.
He comes closer to her.
Something else bothering you-? Liz nods quietly.
So- Tell me about it-
I will, but not now- I'm sorry if- I- (BEAT)

I don't like being watched. I never have. I feel like a freak only if someone's watching me. Suddenly: Angry YELLS... then fists pounding the walls an fenders. The doors open and they are inundated by reporters and TV CREWS and cameras and flashes. There are, literally, hundreds of them. This time from all over the world: Japa UK, Germany...

Agents cordon off the street with yellow tape, holding th press at bay. As the truck rolls by, hordes of bystanders push forward, hoping for a glimpse of Hellboy. Some of them chase run alongside the vehicle, carrying support/hatred signs.
May I suggest that tonight you refrain from signing autographs.
It's the garbage truck. It makes the wrong statement. About who we are.
You think that's what this is about? Transportation???
The truck stops near other official vehicles. Overhead, t soaring roadbed of the Brooklyn Bridge. At the sight of the BPRD team, some protestors throw eggs Hellboy shields Liz from the barrage.
C'mon- show us your powers-
Oh- No, no, no, it's not a parlor trick.
What are you, a mermaid??
Oh, goodness, no- I-
You say you can read things- things about people- so read me- c'mon- read me- The crowd of reporters and onlookers laughs and applauds.
What do you see?
Very well, if you insist. (webbed hand on reporter's chest) You... keep... a large, battery-operated vibrating egg by your bedside... A shrieking CAMERA CREW runs up loaded with video equipme
You! Demon-man! Will you take a DNA test?
It's "Hellboy" not "Demon-man"- One of the projectiles hits him. The crowd roars. Hellboy gazes back at them- seething.
Let me take care of this. Johann bravely confronts the news teams and the crowd.
Ladies and Gentlemen, my name is Johann Kraus and I beg you to allow us- (interrupted by catcalls) -Please, we need space to work- please-
The REPORTERS bombard him with questions. He signals for silence.
In due time- very soon- we will provide all the answers you require, all the whos, whys and wherefors- But for now- An egg hits him in the face- hard. The crowd roars-
Great P.R... He gets ready to pummel the crowd. Liz stops him.
Shh! Give him a chance...

-it's been a long... long time... for many decades really, that the BPRD has served you- all of you... in silence. We have waged an unknown war - but a very real one. Heroes have died unrewarded and unrecognized so that you might go about your daily life. To work, to marry, to bid your children goodnight. Little by little, the crowd grows quiet.
In exchange, we have been consigned to the lies and racist innuendo of the tabloids. And there we have lived without complaint - until now. 54
Johann's speech is replayed in broadcast TV VANS, HOMES, PUBS and BARS all over the world to a fascinated human population. All colors and creeds.
But perhaps soon- after learning of our hardships and sacrifices, you may decide that our humble lives may, in some way, have a value... and a meaning-
The camera lights reflect off Johann's glass head.

I pray that you will allow us to defend your good fortune- to guarantee the blessing that is a peaceful night's sleep. A night free from monsters and nightmares. And if so- (chokes back tears) If so- then all we ask in return... from you... is a little respect and the chance, remote as it may be, to prove ourselves worthy of a tiny, tiny place in this- God's Earth.
(rolls his eyes) This is sooo corny- A moment of silence ensues-- Then, the wet-eyed reporters applaud- the crowd applauds- Liz applauds, Abe applauds. Hellboy is agog!!
What-?? What-??
(DAZZLED)
He has a nice voice. All business now, Johann steps over to the group.
Come on. We have work to do- 56
Hellboy, Abe and Johann peer over the cornice of a bowlin alley rooftop. The CROWDS are visible in the distance. Hellboy looks through THE SCHUFFTEN GLASSES.
Nothing yet, Sparky, over- 57
The BPRD truck is parked behind the bowling alley, direct under the bridge. Its back door is open; Liz and manning at the communications center.
I read you, Red. Keep looking- Manning is bored, looks at his watch.
Looking at what, for goodness sake-? (looks at the Schufften glasses) What do these things do-? Liz starts locking and unlocking a series of lenses and prisms. Both Abe and Johan wear similar gear.
In 1778 Emil Schufften, a Good friend of Benjamin Franklin, designed these optical sets with the intent of photographing fairies in England...
Let's get out of here- We're never going to find it-
Hey- Sparky, I think we got one. Manning studies the image on the monitor: a bag lady push a shopping cart full of cats-
That? Oh, please, she looks as sweet as she can-
Red, turn on the "antiglamour" filter... (to Manning) Fairy folk use a spell called "glamour" to seem human and nice- (BEAT)
These lenses allow you to see their real appearance...

,,f 58 EXT. BOWLING ALLEY PARKING LOT - NIGHT 58 Bellboy turns a few knobs on the goggles, then raises the 59 59 POV GOGGLES. As a series filters enter the visual field, the bag lady transforms into an ugly, muscle-bound troll. 60
Oh, dear Lord. (PAUSE)
What about the cats?
She eats them.
"She??" That's a "she"?????
We're moving in, Sparky-

head_text.subj: BOWLING ALLEY / BACK ALLEY/ UNDER THE BRIDGE 61

text: HE, Johann and Abe follow the Bag Lady. She opens a servi
The bag lady goes through the rear of the bowling alley a through a basement door. The room RUMBLES with the sound rolling balls and toppling pins.
(WHISPERS)
Maybe we can bowl a few frames, uh?
(splays his webbed fingers) Bowling balls- they give me trouble.
How about a beer, then? Now that we're "out"- Whaddya say, Mein Herr?
Sorry. I don't drink.
Hellboy and Abe enter the basement: no sign of the old woman. Just a Warehouse-

Adjust the prisms to "2" Abe moves his glasses, Hellboy fumbles his own- unsuccessfully. Now the WHOLE ROOM transforms under the new optical elements: Its geometry remains somewhat unchanged, but instead of a pile of boxes a tree trunk and a large, moss rock are visible, where there were iron beams now tree trunks and stone columns are visible...
Where a large banner hung, now a huge, rusty mechanical lock.
What the heck is that?
A locking mechanism-
Mmh- I'll take care of it- He clenches his stone fist, rears back...
No- You destroy it. We'll never get in- He adjusts the valves at the tips of his fingers and approaches the lock.
Ah, of course- the Fishbowl touch-
Johann's s ecto-tendrils enter the-
-filling it, making a few complex gears turn and move- 65
Opens and the floor drops away, revealing a stone stairca Johann withdraws his protoplasmic tendrils and closes off the valves.
Gentlemen: welcome to Troll Market.

Troll Market is a steamy, medieval nightmare. A labyrinth narrow alleys and foetid vapour. Trolls scavenge the crumbling, marble shoreline, picking through garbage, scattering vermin. Muddy water trickles down from above, forming cloudy puddles. Roaming vendors hawk exotic objects from every culture an century. At kiosks and shops, Trolls peddle cats (skinned or alive cadres of Lovecraftian entities stroll about: Mer-men, Goblins and a few select species unknown to any cosmology A dogfight of sorts is taking place in a small ring. Inst of pitbulls, multi-limbed creatures leap at one another while violent bettors laugh and shout. At the rail, Abe watches in horror, then sees a woman in rags making her way through the crowd. He catches a glimp of her slippered feet... .which flash with pearls and gold embroidery. His curiosity aroused, he follows her. 67
The woman inspects a pile of ancient bric-a-brac at a mar stall; her cowl swings aside, briefly revealing her face. It's the PRINCESS. In these grotesque surroundings, her beauty is transcendent.
Abe is thunderstruck. As she turns to leave, they briefly make eye contact. On bandaged arm: a bracelet adorned with the seal's coat of arms!
(into microphone) Brother Red!!
(INTERCOM)
Not now, Abe. As the Princess disappears into the mob, Abe hurries afte her. 68
Hellboy and Johann show a picture of a tooth fairy to a surly SHOP OWNER.

Never seen anything like it. No one sells `em down here - over in Jersey, maybe. Behind him, there's a faceless CAVE BERSERKER: a tall and gnarly ogre, his naked chest crisscrossed with scars, his feet encased in iron shoes. Growling, it bares its teeth at HE. HB smiles back-
Hiya, Chuck-
Abe follows the Princess down an alley - and then another one, narrow and dark. Panhandlers pull at his belt; he ba them away. 70
Now Johann shows a drawing of the royal seal to the shop owner.
What about this?? Do you recognize this seal?
The shop owner's face suddenly grows pale.
You'd better go. Now.
Please. We'll make it worth your while. The shop owner claps his hands. BERSERKER takes two steps forward, ROARING. Its iron shoes go CLOMP-CLOMP!!
He's not friendly- Hellboy huffs and walks up to the creature.

Well, neither am I- BAMMMM!!!!! With a single uppercut, he sends it flying toward the ceiling, shoeless. The shop keeper watches in until it lands, about thirty feet away in the middle of t dogfight. The crowd scatters as the mongrel creatures attack the th with blind instinct. Hellboy grabs the shop owner by the lapels and pulls him close. The shop owner's head rockets back and forth like boxer's speed bag as HB "gently" slaps him around. Teeth everywhere.
Feeling more chatty now??
It's rumors! ... just- No- don't hit me, all right? There's talk of a revolt- a revolt against the human world- Hellboy releases him, then looks around.
Where the hell is Abe?? He pushes his belt locator-

1.,,,d 71 INT. TROLL MARKET ALLEY MAZE - NIGHT 71 The Princess has entered a shop selling MAPS and PRINTS. stays outside, watching through a window as she negotiate to purchase a silver and crystal CYLINDER contained in a safety holding case. The SALESMAN denies it at first but after the Princess ha him a gold bracelet he finally acquiesces while vowing to her. He extracts the cylinder from its holding case and hands it to her. A red locator light flashes on Abe's utility belt.
(INTERCOM)
Hey, Abe, gimme me your twenty-
I'm following a lead, Red. Keep your locator -. A large TROLL cuts him off-
Excuse me- What do you think you're doing?
(INTERCOM)
Are you in trouble? Talk to me, Abe. Another TROLL comes up behind Abe.
I don't think you- The TROLL opens a small wooden box and extracts a nasty looking Insect: A NARCOTIC BUG.
Oh, my- The second TROLL loads the buzzing bug - like a bullet - into a blowpipe. Abe turns just as he blows. The bug land on Abe's chest and sinks its stinger deep into his flesh. groans.
Abe? What's wrong?
Abe tears it loose and crushes it underfoot. But his visi blurs, he staggers forward and falls, face first, onto th cobblestones.
(INTERCOM)
Abe? Come in - Abe? Dammit -
The locator's blue light dims; concerned, Hellboy and Joh look at each other. Seeing his chance, the shop keeper melts away into the crowd.
Abe opens his eyes and slowly gets up. He looks around: h surrounded by racks of ancient scrolls and musty books. T door is locked. Instinctively he looks for his belt- It's not there.

If you are looking for your weapons, my guards took them. Abe turns to face the Princess, who stands only a few fee away. She has cast off her dingy cloak and is radiant in fine silk robes. She is feeding slices of fruit to a cage of large, featherless REPTILE/BIRDS.
I - I carry no weapons, madam- I assure you...
Why were you following me? Abe is ashamed to realize the real answer. He's utterly beguiled by her.
Are you seeking to join my brother?
Your brother-??
In his revolt against the humans?
A revolt? No, no, no, I- You are sorely mistaken... He takes a step forward but the YRDRIG comes out of nowhe barking and growling.
Then answer me truthfully- Why were you following me?
My name is Abe Sapien -
(LAUGHING)
There is no such name!
Horrible- I know- but- Please, hear me, I beg you. I am an agent of the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense. If we can assist you-
Give me your hand. Abe complies, thrilled as she runs her fingers over his palm. The Princess' face brightens. She smiles and gestures for the YRDRIG to yield.
Down Yrdrig - he's a friend. The YRDRIG jumps on Abe and starts licking him with all three tongues.
Yrdrig's really just a puppy. The drooling beast pins Abe to the floor with one paw.
(WHEEZING)
Nice puppy...
The YRDRIG lifts Abe with one of its mouths and gives him playful shake.
My father gave him to me. Yrdrig, leave our guest alone- The Yrdrig drops Abe onto the floor.
Out! Out! Bad Yrdrig! As the animal skulks away, she helps Abe up-
(bows her head) My name is Princess Nuala.
(bows his head) Your highness, the honor is all mine.
May I apologize, Mr. Sapien, for the manner in which we brought you here... couldn't be too sure. She offers him the locator belt.
Please, it was nothing. Love the puppy,
And under diplomatic immunity - may I seek asylum??

We would be... honored, I'm sure. But, may I ask: from whom do you seek asylum? Suddenly, a COMMOTION outside. The door flies off its hinges. Hellboy and Johann burst in, leaping over a pile fallen guards outside.
Red, no! I'm all right! The Princess shrinks back, but Abe motions for calm.
Gentlemen! Some respect, please! The Princess looks with dismay at her vanquished bodyguar The NARCOTIC BUGS buzz around HB, who swats them like mosquitoes.
And that was my royal guard.
Red, apologize at once! We are in the presence of... royalty! Hellboy's never heard Abe sound like this- giddy as a schoolboy.
(to Abe) You're vouching for her, I take it. Mr Sapien?
Oh, most definitely. She's from an ancient, noble line -

- of warriors. The Children of the Earth. (to the Princess) I'm sorry, Princess Nuala. With such a fierce bloodline, we cannot take your claim of allegiance at face value. He produces the ANCIENT SEAL.
Standing at a long deal table, the Princess lights a cand and examines the ancient seal.
Where did you get this?
Human side, two nights ago- The Princess studies their faces.

In ancient times a seal like this was delivered to the enemy as a declaration of war. A signal from the underground realm to the entire world. It prefaced the awakening of the Golden Army- Johann sits down heavily.
I feared as much.
(to Johann) What-? What-? A goblin army-? Johann shakes his glass head, overcome with worry.
Golden Army. The unstoppable tide. There has been nothing to substantiate such a

Not a tale- At the dawn of time... Even before the great flood, man and the Children of the Earth shared this planet... (she sighs) But as man in his greed expanded his dominion, there ensued a bitter war...
Silhouetted against a crimson sky, the shadows of thousan upon thousands of goblins, elves and fairies do battle wi hordes of men.
In those days, my people were led by my Father, King BALOR, the one-armed king of Elfland. KING BALOR fights valiantly at the side of his son, the tall, pale elf knight: PRINCE NUADA.
The bloodshed went on year after year. Many lives were lost. An overview of the battlefield fades as the sun sinks bel the horizon.
Seated in an 'opulent throne room, KING BALOR addresses a wretched guild of deformed goblins.
It was then that the King ordered the Sigri to build him a new, invincible army.

Lit by the fires of a hundred furnaces, stoked by scores goblins, a MECHANICAL ARMY is born. Metal plates and movi parts are hammered into shape on enormous anvils and bolt onto tall, ornate, golden figures.
This was an army that would not eat, drink or grow tired. A heartless, ruthless force made of the purest metal, mined from the depths of the earth.
In perfect ranks, in eerie unison, the golden soldiers li up, filling the entire courtyard, awaiting the King's command.

The Sigri worked until the winter moon was high in the sky - The CHIEF GOBLIN BLACKSMITH displays three curved segment of gold. He fits them together and holds a completed CROW directly over the King's head.

I am King Balor, leader of the Golden Army. Is there anyone here who disputes my right??? Silence. Prince NUADA kneels next to his father. The Gobl crowns the King, who lifts his sword. In response- TCHANKKKKK!!!! The new army raises its lances, hailing hi
As the humans make ready for battle, a tremor shakes the earth. They turn their gaze to the horizon, which bristle with the arms of the approaching troops.
The fight is brutal. The mechanical soldiers mow down the humans by the hundreds, their swords replaced as needed b battle axes, bludgeons and lances.

But this army knew no bounds, had no remorse, felt no loyalty, engaging in blind battle with man, woman or child. The horde crushes everything, with swords slicing through armor as if it were paper. Every blow is deadly, precise. The army marches ever onward, like a grinding machine devouring tender flesh. At length, there is no sign of life in the human camp.

And as the king gazed upon the earth awash in blood and at the impassive metal faces of the army he had created, his heart grew heavy. Victory was gained at too high a price. This war should never have been waged. The King surveys the carnage. The mechanical soldiers sta in symmetrical ranks awaiting further instructions.

And so he arranged a truce: the surviving men would keep to their cities and we children of the Earth would dwell within the forests. This pact, he declared, would be honored by our sons and the sons of their sons until the end of time. Listening to his father, Prince Nuada reacts with anguish
But my brother did not believe in the promises of men. He marched off into exile, vowing to return if the Sons of the Earth ever needed him. Prince Nuada walks away towards a dying sunset. 81
The goblins lock the golden army into a huge cavern, unde the light of ten thousand flickering torches.
And the golden army was ordered to lie dormant, locked inside the earth itself - and there it is to this day, waiting for the wearer of the crown to command it again.
The Princess finishes her tale. Hellboy and Johann look a each other.
Where is that crown??
My father had it destroyed. Cut into three pieces. One for mankind... She holds up her piece of the puzzle, which dangles from chain around her neck.
.Two for the sons of the Earth.
So, you do need our help..?
I'm afraid it's the other way around. She holds the CYLINDER she purchased.
The location of the Golden Army is contained within this cylinder-- She opens it and produces a parchment hidden inside. She extends it: the map just shows three coordinates.
Just a global chart, Edo - that's the old name for Tokyo - Moscow, and Renvyle here-
But nothing else- She rolls back the map into the cylinder.
So far, this is a family matter. To intervene will bring nothing but trouble.
Good, I like trouble.
The Princess leads the group through the surging, noisy crowd of bizarre creatures. Hellboy, Johann and Abe bring the rear.
No- not that way. Too risky- They're lost in unfamiliar alleys and byways. Until-
(finally, pointing) There. Stairs to the street...
Hold! The Prince appears at the top of the stairs, dressed in black. He's surrounded by his elite guard. Stepping to th rail, he points at his sister and addresses the crowd:
Hear me, o creatures of the forest! Can you recognize a traitor? She's here to betray her own! He casts a disdainful look at Hellboy.

I'm here to recruit all of you against the humans. Make your decision now. Those who join me will be rewarded. The rest... will be killed. A sudden silence falls over the throng. Then, the sound o CRACKING KNUCKLES. Everyone looks at Hellboy, who is unclenching his fists and stretching his neck. He starts up the stairs, but a couple of the GUARDS leap down to block his path.
I'm gonna put this as delicately as I can.
A crowded BOWLING ALLEY is full of serious-looking player in colorful shirts and shoes. Someone rolls a ball down the center lane, and as it spee right at the pins...

Look out, Manny! Strike city..! CRASH! Hellboy erupts from under the floorboards, fightin the clawing monsters right behind him! As the bowlers freeze in shock, dozens of creatures pour into the human world. Grunting, Hellboy punches his way free, only to be dragged back by the tail by WINK. Abe, shielding the Princess, demonstrates the way of the water, a fluid martial arts display. He ducks and parries the blows, leaping like Nureyev. Abe scoops up a couple of bowling balls and rolls them at the Prince's guards. He manages to knock a couple off the feet. As they get back up, he uses the available bowling pins a clubs. The screaming PATRONS rush for the doors. 85

Outside, the civilians flee, but the news crews come is back. He running. As their lights blaze up, REPORTER 2 gapes in disgust: Hellboy's massive hands are wrapped around the neck of a sweet little OLD LADY! He beats her mercilessly!
Help me...! Please, somebody..!
(to his cameraman) Oh, my God!! Oh, my- Roll! Roll on this!
It's not what you think -!

(pointing at HB) He's lost his mind! He's worse than any of them..! CUT BACK to Hellboy, revealing that the old lady is actua WINK. Liz runs over with a prism from the SCHUFFTEIN GOGGLES an sticks it in front of the camera lens, revealing the trut The reporter checks his monitor.
ALL the BPRD team, including Liz, is swept up in this fig The denizens of the troll market overturn parked cars and knock down lamp posts, ROARING with excitement.
(MUTTERING)

The fire is not my enemy-- it is a part of me-- Liz yells out a warning... and then throws a barrage of flaming bolts. A pair of crab-like THINGS shrivel and bur Johann melds with a heavy steel dumpster, until only his legs are visible beneath it. Bending at the waist - SPLAT he brings it down on the head of the nearest creature! WINK and HB duke it out for a few beats and then HB final vanquishes the Troll, Ripping his Iron Mace off and throw it away. As the other monsters retreat... .the PRINCE appears: in his hand a complex mechanical GRENADE. Immediately worried, Abe hustles the Princess ov to the BPRD truck. The Prince twists a timer. His bloodied trolls disperse, screaming, renewing the panic.
(to Hellboy) I will find you, young daemon - (to Nuala) - and you, too, my sister. Meanwhile, here's a taste of what lies in store.
He throws the grenade. Hellboy dives, just in time to cat it. He's about to throw it down a sewer, when he listens its clockwork innards then: PING!!!!
It's a dud, your royal assness - ! The Prince has disappeared, along with his horde.
How do you like that? Just when I was loosening up. Then... CLACKK!!!. Hellboy scrutinizes the grenade as it opens up like a beans. flower... and spews out a handful of Brightly colored
Pick them up!!
Abe. relax- It's jumping beans... Abe is scrambling to retrieve them.
Do as I say! With a sigh, Hellboy scoops up a few.
How many do you have?
Three, how about you?
Three! There's always seven! Find the last one!!!
The seventh bean is next to a manhole. It hops closer edge...
Quick, it's going for water! Hellboy reaches for it... but it's too late. The thing ho into the manhole and lands somewhere below with a SPLASH.
Oh, my God, evacuate the area!

Abe, please, get a grip. A RUMBLE from below their feet. WHAMMMM! A HUGE TREE punches up through the pavement, overturning cars, knocking buildings off their foundations and rippin up through the Bridge overpass!! Picking up speed, the tree branches soar up, up, up... in the moonlit clouds. Hellboy approaches the massive, trunk, gazing up in fascination. Birds and creatures emerge from the inside a flutter around, grass overtakes pavement- and for a momen Chinatown looks like the Garden of Eden.

Whoa. Just like the story books. Manning and Liz take a few steps into it: a SQUIRREL-BEIN climbs on Liz's shoulder and a couple of IRIDESCENT HUMMINGBIRDS fly around her "ala" SNOW WHITE. A small cro starts wandering into this idyllic scenario.
This is so beautiful-
So- perfect- so peaceful-
Hey!!! He spots. the prince, at the base of the tree. Knocking o
Hey- Jhonny Apleseed- What are you-?? Oh- Jeez did you have to do that?? Liz starts pulling Manning away and yelling at the crowd-
Back- Go back- right now!!!
What? What? What is he doing-?
He's knocking on wood- summoning an
An elem-
A forest spirit that lives in that tree. He's releasing it-

Oh, and is it that bad?? KKKRRRRCHTCH!!!!! The tree trunk rumbles and shakes under some enormous force. Huge LEAVES tumble to the street. Ev the ever-present NEWS CREWS back away as a huge shape descends. BOOM!! the trunk rips in two, revealing a curled, dormant ELEMENTAL. Five stories high- Fierce as nature. THE ELEMENTAL steps of the tree and stares at Hellboy. Uttering a weird, guttural SOUND, the Giant raises an arm and pulverizes a GASOLINE TRUCK! WHUMP- ! Flames leap up! The Elemental grins with delight turning his baleful gaze on the Princess. As she shrinks back, her pet Yrdrig rushes at the thing, snarling. In a single leap, it sinks its teeth into the Elemental's heel

Good dog. (to Elemental) Now, Woody... You want to fight someone, you fight with me. Hellboy humorously adopts a kung fu pose, as in Bruce Lee The Elemental hops forward, New branches sprout from his limbs, shaking the Yrdrig off.

(to the Princess) This may not be the best place for you, your majesty. With your permission... He offers the Princess his arm. She takes it and allows A to lead her away. A moment later, the Elemental smashes t ground where they had been standing! Every time the ELEMENTAL moves, he trails behind roots an branches. The roots connecting to its feet and leading to the original tree trunk, like an umbilical cord. Johann sees this-
I have a plan- He looks at Abe-
-as the fishman helps the Princess up into the rear of th BPRD garbage truck. Up front, behind the wheel, Liz starts the engine.

88 Hellboy climbs a fire escape as the Elemental's arm/branc extend and grow over the ladder, pulling it down below hi feet. Hellboy ducks into one of the open windows as the Elemental tears away the rest of the scaffolding. Growing and discarding branches and roots.

Hellboy runs like a cockroach through a dilapidated KITCH Behind him, the Elemental's massive BRANCH/FIST crashes through the wall, then pursues him as he runs down a corridor littered with debris. Like a wrecking ball, the Elemental demolishes each secti of the corridor as Hellboy runs.
Hellboy steps out onto a ledge ten stories up, just out o reach of the Elemental.
(to the Elemental) What now, Big Boy? You get a ladder? The Elemental jumps up and down, trying to reach him, barking in frustration. Hellboy's RADIO crackles:
(on the radio) HB? This is Blue. The Princess is fine.
So what?
So, lead him to the bridge. Hellboy looks over the buildings and sees the Brooklyn Bridge in the distance.
That's nine blocks from here, Fishbowl!
You'll figure it out.

What's at the bridge? Abe - ? Liz? Hello??? No answer. Muttering, Hellboy climbs higher, up a buzzing neon sign reading "Hotel". The Elemental smashes the letters "tel"... so Hellboy cli the "0" to the roof.
Liz drives the garbage truck toward the Brooklyn Bridge. Johann is sitting next to her.

Hellboy makes a running start and leaps off the building. sails over the alley, reaches for the approaching cornice and almost loses his grip! He hangs on for dear life. Behind him, the Elemental appears, climbing onto an adjac roof. As his feet smash through the skylights, the Elemen pulls down a WATER TOWER. A wall of water rolls toward Hellboy, like an ocean wave! Hellboy leaps to the next roof... and the water shoots ov the edge of the building, cascading onto the street below
Liz parks the truck near the Brooklyn Bridge. Using binoculars, Abe peers out the back doors to see Hellboy bringing the Elemental closer.
Johann - they're almost here. Johann moves among massive construction machinery. He sto at a stack of heavy SPOOLS OF CABLE. Abe comes running, pointing at the cable.
Yes. I had the very same idea... He gets behind the levers and handles of a complex machin which holds a half mile of steel cable.
(gazing at the controls) .but how do you operate this??
If you'll permit me... Johann opens his fingers, and plunges both arms deep into the mechanism! Instantly, the diesel engine STARTS UP.
(to Abe) Stand back, Abe. A hydraulic strut lifts the spool, then pitches it throug the air, spinning off 300 yards of cable. It splashes dow near the far shore of the East River.
Now, tie it onto the pontoons on the other side. (seeing Hellboy coming) Quickly, Abe!
